content.text:
I'm down for a "paper" system, should we use a channel in our transactions so we have an easy place to see the transaction later? Maybe something like (#)ssb-mutual-manual or (#)ssb-gift for easy parsing in the future?

I'll start with some arbitrary syntax, inspired by Reddit cryptocurrency tip bots:

#ssb-gift 1 beer [@mix](@ye+QM09iPcDJD6YvQYjoQc7sLF/IFhmNbEqgdzQo3lQ=.ed25519)

Reasonably-priced beer(s) redeemable in-person whenever it's mutually convenient. :beers:
